sentences.en: Endophthalmitis displays mull echoes, retinal thickened or detached.
sentences.cn: 眼内炎回声杂乱, 视网膜增厚或伴有脱离.

sentences.en: He tried to mull things over in his mind.
sentences.cn: 他试图在他的脑海中思索事情.

sentences.en: He’s mulling over the proposals before making any changes.
sentences.cn: 实施变革之前他在反复考虑这些建议。

sentences.en: I nearly made a mull of the business.
sentences.cn: 我几乎把生意弄得一团糟.

sentences.en: I sat there and tried to mull things over in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我坐在那儿,尽量把事情仔细考虑一下.

sentences.en: I would mull quickly over my options.
I'll leave you alone here so you can mull it over.
sentences.cn: 我不打扰你了，你在这儿可以仔细考虑考虑这事儿。

sentences.en: If so, give yourself a few extra days to mull things over before finalizing anything.
sentences.cn: 假如这样的话, 给自己些时日加以思考再做决定.

sentences.en: Mull: Muslin fabric fixed to the back of a case bound book under the spine covering.
sentences.cn: 纱布: 贴于精装书籍的书脊上,由脊纸包着的疏孔薄布.

sentences.en: Now we shall be able to mull some ale!
sentences.cn: 现在我们可以用它来调热甜酒了!

sentences.en: Richard Bilton , BBC News, on the Isle of Mull.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司新闻,RichardBilton, 穆尔岛报道.

sentences.en: RICHARD BILTON : So where does all this leave a community like Mull?
sentences.cn: RICHARDBILTON:那么所有这一切会给穆尔岛这样的群体带来什么样的影响 呢 ?

sentences.en: The company is mulling over a share offer.
This is the optimum angle to tumble and mull the sand.
sentences.cn: 这是最佳角度倒下来的沙子和仔细考虑.

sentences.en: Under such circumstances, we had to declare this agreement mull and void.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 我们不得不宣布这份协议无效.

words.tran_cn: 研磨；思索或思考某事物；使醉

trans.tran_en: to think about a problem, plan etc for a long time before making a decision

trans.tran_cn: （加糖，香料等）烫热（酒等），深思熟虑，磨碎
